resources.string: Welcome to Dan and Meigan\'s NASA Space Application!
Get ready for cool NASA space pictures!!
Earth is the third rock from the Sun!
The Earth is not a perfect sphere!
Chili had the largest earthquake on May 22, 1960 with a magnitude of 9.5!
According to NASA Earth Observatory, El Azizia, Libya recorded the hottest temperature at 57.8 degrees Celsius!
The coldest place on Earth is Antarctica. Winter temperatures can drop below minus 73 degrees Celsius!
The Earths gravity is uneven across the globe due to the Earth not being a perfect sphere!
Earth may have once had 2 moons!
People have climbed Mount Everest (29,029 feet above sea level) without oxygen!
